name: Happy Luna
description:
PEAK OF HAPPINESS

A short game made in about 2 days, available for Android. 

Luna is Happy. Luna is a Happy Girl. MUCH VERY A LOT HAPPY.

SOURCE CODE: https://github.com/KyleKun/happy_luna

How to Play: 

USE THE JOYSTICK AND TAP ON THINGS ON SCREEN! EASY!

Credits
  • Programming, Story, Art and Hapinness: me, myself and I.
  • Music: Various classical music pieces, played by me.
  • Sounds: Freesound.org
  • Text Fonts: PrincessSofia & ButterflyKids (from GoogleFonts)

Thanks to the Flame Engine and Bonfire libraries for making gamedev in Flutter a delightful experience.
